title: Should callmepeterz be the next Head of State?
description:
Cast your ballot using /vote. Vote with "yes" **OR** "no". 
*Example:* ```
/vote yes
```
footer: YOU DO NOT HAVE TO REVEAL YOUR BALLOT TO ANYBODY, INCLUDING GOVERNMENTAL OFFICERS!

options.name: yes
options.description: I agree that Peter should be the next Head of State

options.name: no
options.description: I DO NOT agree that Peter should be the next Head of State
